title: A detailed interpretation of the ring in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: A detailed interpretation of the ring in a dream for a single woman. The ring is one of women’s favorite jewelry in reality that can be given to her as a gift to express love and care and it will make her feel very happy. It can also have the same meaning when she sees it in a dream. There are many beautiful and promising interpretations when she sees the ring. In a dream and some negative interpretations of seeing a ring with other details, so in this article today we will learn about the interpretation of a ring in a dream for single people in detail. Interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream for a single woman: The dream of a ring for an unmarried girl is closely related to her emotional life, which is represented by her partner, and Imam Ibn Sirin mentioned that If an unmarried woman sees a golden ring in a dream, this vision is unpleasant and indicates the cancellation of her engagement. . In reality, it is as if you were seeing a broken ring. As for buying a ring, if you dreamed of buying a diamond ring, this vision indicates a high status that you will reach in the near future, and God knows best. If a single woman sees that her father has bought her the ring and it is also made of diamonds, then This vision indicates that she will receive a lot of money from her inheritance from her father. If she sees a diamond ring, this dream indicates her engagement to a young man who occupies a prominent position in reality. Seeing an unmarried girl wearing a ring indicates kindness and livelihood for her and her family members. This ring included a row of diamonds. In general, a dream about wearing a ring indicates marriage soon, and God knows best. If the ring is lost in a dream, this vision indicates the end of their romantic relationship in reality. Seeing a ring made in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her marriage to a man who has a high status in society. The dream symbolizes The silver ring indicates a happy ending to her current romantic relationship, as it indicates her marriage to her life partner. Interpretation of the vision of an engagement ring for a single woman. As for the dream of an engagement ring, it is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate kindness, sustenance, blessing, and ease of circumstances for her, in addition to the arrival of good news for her in the near future, and God knows best. . This dream also shows his engagement in the near future, and God knows best. In conclusion, he explained that it is important to search for interpretations of dreams, especially if they are recurring, and it is important to understand the difference between dreams that have meaning and dreams that have no meaning, and there is no point in making connections. To reality, they are just thoughts that you want to express and express.

title: Interpretation of a gift of chocolate in a dream

preview.html: Our article today revolves around the interpretation of a gift of chocolate in a dream, as chocolate is considered one of the most famous types of sweets that many adults and children love in our reality, but it is everything that is beautiful in our reality and love has a good meaning if we dream of it. Therefore, during our article today, we will shed Highlighting the most important clues as seen by the great interpreters of Ibn Sirin regarding the symbol of chocolate in a dream, whether it is a man, a single woman, a pregnant woman, or a married woman. Women or divorced women, especially in the case of a gift of chocolate to the dreamer, in detail through the encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of a gift of chocolate in a dream. The symbol of chocolate in a dream. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing chocolate in a dream carries many good and happy connotations for its viewers, especially since every time you see chocolate it has a different meaning. Among the most important of these interpretations: Interpretation of a dream about eating chocolate in a dream for a man. Ibn Sirin believes that whoever sees chocolate in his dream, especially chocolate, carries his human vision of great food and a lot of money, and he is on his way to it without difficulty from the dreamer, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for whoever sees himself buying chocolate in In his dream, the vision is an indication that the dreamer will have a good friend who will help and support him, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. While whoever sees himself offering one of the chocolates, this is a sign of intense love for the one who gives it to him, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. As for consuming large amounts of chocolate in a dream It is an indication that a lot of good and cheerful news is on its way to the dreamer and that this news came after long periods of fatigue, sadness and distress, and God is Most High and Most Knowing.Interpretation of a dream about eating dark chocolate for single women. Ibn Sirin believes that an unmarried girl who sees a large number of boxes of chocolate in a dream It is a desirable vision that carries many connotations of many happy news that is on its way and that it will fulfill a wish while it waits, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. The difference in the color of chocolate in a person’s dream does not bring any bad sign, rather it is a sign of a close marriage to a man who loves her, especially If the taste of chocolate is good in a dream, God is Most High and knows best. Chocolate with fruit in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates a happy marriage and stability with a man who loves her and God will take care of her and their lives will be happy and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But if a girl loses pieces of chocolate in her dream, this is evidence of... Breaking off her relationship or engagement, and God knows best. Eating chocolate in a dream for a divorced woman. Ibn Sirin believes that a divorced woman who sees herself eating a lot of chocolate bars in her dream was a sign of the end of the difficult, exhausting, and sad period in her life and that God will compensate her in the near future, by God’s will. But if the divorced woman sees herself cooking Or she cooks chocolate, this is evidence that she will achieve her goal after a long wait and suffering, and that God will provide her with good news that will compensate for her many sorrows, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Better. But if someone sees someone offering her chocolate, she will be happy to marry a man

title: Interpretation of a shirt in a dream: Wearing a shirt in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of dreaming about a shirt, whether white, black, red, green, blue, new, old, clean, dirty, wide, narrow, long, short, buying a shirt in a dream for a single, married woman. And a pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a shirt in a dream. A shirt in a dream is interpreted by a woman as profit, livelihood, debts, justice, achieving what is desired, good news, and covering. Seeing a new, loose shirt in a dream indicates a husband or wife, and compatibility and coexistence between them will be pleasing to God. Seeing a torn or burnt shirt, or with it, means that something bad will happen to the dreamer at home or in his life, such as worries and problems. A shirt in one dream is a covering, stability, harmony and harmony. Whoever sees in a dream that he is wearing the clothes of an ascetic and a righteous person, then the vision indicates the uprightness of the dreamer. In his religion, and following the straight path in matters of his religious and worldly life. For a single man or woman to see the new dress that was purchased or received as a gift, or to find it and then wear it, this indicates marriage. Seeing that you receive a shirt as a gift in a dream is good news from He dreams that he has new clothes on, this indicates that his affairs are in harmony and his well-being. In dreams, it is advisable to wash and iron the shirt, and he also praises seeing a girl sewing the shirt or ironing it with an iron. If he sees her worn out, then he makes matters difficult and separates them. A thin dress in a dream is tenderness and tenderness. Wearing a shirt without a collar or pocket suggests cuffing. Wearing the shirt. Seeing a torn shirt pocket in a dream is a sign of poverty entering upon you. Many shirts in a dream are good deeds. As for seeing wet clothes in a dream, it indicates that something has faltered and that there is something preventing its completion. Short clothes in a dream. That which does not cover the private parts is one of the shortcomings in matters of religion. Wearing a shirt inside out in a dream indicates a change in status other than what it is and may indicate hypocrisy. Seeing a shirt cut lengthwise is considered a deception, but if it is cut widthwise, then we are talking about an accident. Seeing a new shirt worn over an old, dirty shirt indicates A person’s outer appearance is different from his inner self. A shirt in a married woman’s dream directly symbolizes her husband. A woman who sees in her dream that she is washing her husband’s shirt and ironing it or even sewing and arranging it, this is a good interpretation in terms of livelihood and profit. A white shirt is a sign of good character and good morals. It is good to buy A shirt and giving it away because it reflects a general improvement in living conditions Buying a shirt can indicate good news, such as the possibility of pregnancy in the coming months, and a new shirt can indicate a new home If a girl dreams that she is wearing a man’s shirt, she will get married soon If she sees that she is buying a shirt and then gives him a gift To her father, she will make her father happy with good news related to success or finding a new job. Perhaps the shirt indicates profit and travel if it is blue, black, or green. The shirt in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of great happiness and joy, especially if it is colored or white. The black shirt in a pregnant woman’s dreams indicates Male child

title: Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin cheating on an unmarried girl

preview.html: Betrayal, so I present to you a different website. In this article, the interpretation of a dream about the betrayal of an unmarried girl.Interpretation of the dream about the betrayal of an unmarried girl. Imam Muhammad bin Shirin says about the dream about the betrayal of an unmarried girl that it is one of the dreams that indicates the intensity of this girl’s attachment to the one she loves and her attachment to him to the point that she fears losing her. Excessively. The dream of betrayal also indicates that there are many problems and problems that this girl faces in her life, which require strength and patience to overcome. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that someone very close to her is betraying her secrets, then these are unwanted dreams, indicating That someone is conspiring against her to harm her and distort her reputation in front of people. If an unmarried girl commits treason against someone close to her, such as a friend or lover, this is a sign that she will be robbed and lose some of her valuables. Imam Al-Sadiq spoke about the interpretation of a dream about betrayal. An unmarried girl with the person her boyfriend loves, so that the dreamer feels intense remorse for her betrayal. Imam Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi believes that if an unmarried girl dreams of cheating, this is evidence that she is practicing behavior that is contrary to religious education and she must take the initiative to repent. Imam Ibn Shaheen Al-Zahiri disagreed with the opinion of the Imam Al-Nabulsi, where he said that the interpretation of a dream about an unmarried girl’s betrayal is evidence that she loves someone very much, and that she reciprocates the same love, and therefore this love is volitional. It culminates in the coming of marriage in the near future. Psychologists have a different opinion on seeing betrayal in one dream, as they see that a girl who sees in her dream the betrayal of one of her best friends, this is an indication of her extreme fear of breaking off the relationship between them. A person, whether it is her lover or a friend. Dream Interpretation of Marital Infidelity When an unmarried girl sees that she is getting married and her husband cheats on her with one of her friends, this dream carries with it Imam Ibn Sirin’s indication that her suitor is not suitable for her, which leads to a short-term relationship, Then separation occurs due to discomfort. If an unmarried girl sees that she is marrying someone she loves in reality, but she betrays him after marriage, then this dream expresses the many problems that will arise between them due to lack of understanding. Interpretation of a dream about betrayal for an unmarried girl, if she betrays her future husband, It could be an indication of the extent of her feeling of guilt and dissatisfaction with herself, if she is the one who cheats, while if her partner cheats on her, this is evidence of his feeling of injustice towards her. Read also: What is the interpretation of a dream about a husband’s betrayal according to Ibn Sirin and the opinion of psychologists? What is the interpretation? A dream about a friend cheating on her lover? Many interpreters specializing in psychology have confirmed that seeing a dream about a friend cheating on her lover in a dream is one of the visions that indicate a feeling of fear for the future, as it is a psychological vision. If an unmarried girl sees that she is cheating on her lover with someone He hates him and there are major differences between them. This is one of the visions that express her lying to him about some matters and not telling him everything. Yafa

title: Interpretation of dreams to see the dead person alive, talk to him, kiss him, and cry over him

preview.html: Interpreting a dream about seeing a dead person alive, talking to him, kissing him, crying over him, and seeing him dead in a dream are often disturbing matters, as interpretive scholars have paid attention to interpreting all dreams related to seeing the dead. Dead because it could be a real vision, as this is done according to the nature of the dream itself and according to the person having the vision and his social status. To see a dead person alive, talk to him, kiss him, and cry over him. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream and talking to him? Seeing a dead person in a dream is one of the dreams that many people dream of, as it carries many interpretations, interpretations, and elements, and the interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream and talking to him is as follows: Kissing a dead person in a dream indicates that the dead person is in dire need of a prayer from him, or that the dead person has a debt and hopes to repay it. When the dreamer kisses the dead person and this person is one of his family or friends, this indicates an intense longing for the dead person and always thinking about him. Also, seeing the dead person He speaks in reproach and reproach to the monarch, indicating that the monarch is disobedient and must repent and return to the path of truth. It indicates the intensity of the bond between the dreamer and this person, whether in life or after departure. Interpretation of kissing the dead in a dream for a married woman: There is no doubt that death is inevitable and a reality of The facts of life, but people are still afraid of this word. There are different interpretations of this dream for a married woman, which we include in the following points: When a married woman dreams of kissing one of her relatives, this indicates her desire to please him. If a married woman sees that the deceased kissed her, this indicates stability. Family and its happiness. Dreaming of a dead man kissing a married woman indicates the good condition of her husband, if he is one of the disobedient husbands. If a married woman sees her deceased mother kissing her sick son, this indicates the imminence of recovery. Interpretation of kissing a dead man in a dream for a single woman. Seeing dead people in a dream is one of Dreams that many people see. Scientists have interpreted it in many different interpretations that vary depending on the dream and its nature. Among these interpretations for individuals are the following: Kissing the dead in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates good character and happiness with her future husband. Also, seeing a dead person kissing an unmarried woman and hugging her in a dream indicates her good condition and long life. When an unmarried girl dreams of kissing a dead person She does not know him, as this indicates the benefit and goodness that awaits her in her future life. And when that deceased person is a member of her family, this is evidence of her longing for them and her loneliness. See also: Interpretation of a dream about dirty clothes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about kissing a living dead person for a pregnant woman. A person may believe Whoever dreams of seeing a dead person at first glance indicates that this dream is a disturbing dream with negative interpretations, but it is a wrong belief and may bring good news. In light of the above, here is the interpretation of a dream about a deceased person kissing his pregnant neighbor: Seeing a pregnant woman kissing a dead person in a dream indicates the stability of her health and living conditions that she will enjoy in the next life. When a pregnant woman sees a dead person

title: Learn the interpretation of seeing a dead mother in a dream according to the great interpreters

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead mother: Who among us has not longed for his mother, especially if God Almighty took her? It is human safety and protection, so we find that it can be visited in a dream for many important reasons, which we will learn about and understand during the interpretation of seeing a dead mother in a dream, so we hope to continue. Interpretation of seeing a dead mother This vision expresses important repercussions for the viewer, which are: If the dreamer sees this mother She gives birth to him in a dream, this is a bad sign for the dreamer because it indicates his imminent death. But if he gives birth to him in a dream and his financial situation is bad in reality, this confirms that he will soon receive many good things from his Lord. If she talks to him in a dream while she is happy, this indicates that the events A happy woman approaches him, which will change the course of his life for the better. If she hugs him in a dream, this is an important sign of the dreamer’s transition from poverty to wealth, as well as a sign of family happiness for him because of this transformation in his life. But if he kisses her in a dream, this is clear evidence that he is doing good deeds. Pleases God Almighty, and this makes him enjoy goodness and pleasure in life. Her supplication for the dreamer in a dream is an expression of his great psychological comfort, as he will end his crises without any trace of them afterward, to live a life free of worries. If the dreamer sees that she is smiling at him in the dream, then this It means that he will create an ideal family and his offspring will be good in the future. When you see her sick in a dream, this confirms that there is a problem that this person is facing with his relatives, or perhaps a large number of debts on his shoulders that make him suffer psychologically. When you see her looking at the dreamer in a dream, this means that she will arrive. To an important position at work. This dream may be the result of the dreamer constantly thinking about his mother and praying for her, so he sees her in his dream. Her laughter in the dream is a happy sign for this dreamer, as the vision expresses good news on her way to him, as well as a good omen that she has received great mercy from her Lord. She is in a high rank. But if she laughed but stopped and started crying so hard that her face changed, then this indicates her bad status in the afterlife. title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair and crying in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a man in a dream is an indication of his success in paying off his debts, and if the dreamer is young, this indicates achieving a goal that he has always strived for at this time. Interpretation of seeing hair cut and crying over it in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees that she is cutting her hair, and it was long Very, and she cries a lot over him. This indicates that they are in the life of this single woman who will suffer from this for a long time in her life. If an unmarried woman sees that someone close to her is cutting her hair in a dream. It indicates the problems that she will face with this person in life during this Period. And an unmarried woman seeing in a dream that she cuts her hair in a dream and feeling sorry is an indication that she is going through some debts in her life and will not be able to pay them soon. And the dreaming single woman who saw that her fiancé cut her hair in a dream and it was long. It indicates that she will fall into some... Major crises in her life during this time, and God knows best. See also: Seeing hair cut in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing hair cut and crying in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is cutting her hair and crying a lot. It indicates that he will face a major marital problem and will not be able to end it easily. If a married woman gives scissors to her husband to cut her hair. This is a clear indication that she will currently be in big trouble with her husband. And the married woman is a dreamer who looked at her hair and cried a lot and cut it. It shows that there is something tiring in her life and she will face a difficult time. Either a married woman in a dream The one who looks at her long hair in a dream as she cuts it. She says that she is going through a crisis in her life and is trying to get rid of it, but she will fail. Interpretation of seeing hair cut and crying in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees that she is cutting her hair in a dream and she is very sorry. This indicates that there are major crises going on. This divorced woman has this in her life, and God knows best. And if the divorced woman looks at her short hair in a dream and she is making a story in the dream. This is a sign that she will make a wrong decision in her life, and that will affect her negatively. And the divorced woman who sees in a dream cutting her hair and trying to cut it. It expresses About her intense sadness in her life that she is trying to end at this time in her life. And the divorced woman who saw that her ex-husband was cutting her hair and it was bad. This is evidence of a sad thing that this period of her life will go through, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair In a dream in detail, the interpretation of seeing hair cut and crying over it in a dream about the man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is cutting his hair and it looks beautiful in the dream. A sign of his success and achieving the goal that he wanted to reach for a long time in his life. And the man who sees in a dream that he is cutting his long hair and his appearance It is repaired in a dream. It indicates that he will get rid of a lot of debts that were previously on his account. If the dreamer sees in a dream many men cutting their hair and crying in a dream, this is a clear indication that he will fall into a difficult situation, but he will succeed in getting rid of it. As for the dreamer who sees... In the solution

title: The 50 most important interpretations of a dream about milk for a single woman, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about milk for a single woman differs depending on whether she sees it or just drinks it, and whether it is goat, cow or camel milk. All these details cause complete changes in the interpretation of the dream, which we learn about in some detail through the topic of milk today. For unmarried women in a dream, which was reported by interpreters. A dream about milk for single women. What is the interpretation of a dream about milk for single women? Seeing fresh milk ready to drink is a good dream, which means that there are great opportunities for the girl to enter her life, and she should not waste it or hesitate to make the right decision for her, so as not to lose and then regret it later. If the girl drank and saw that it tasted delicious, there is an inner desire in her, and she is very happy with it, and she is relieved of the severe anxiety that she suffered in silence for a long time. If it has a different taste or color than usual, it is one of the dreams that hint at the painful events that happen to the individual and put him in a state of sadness and depression for a period of time until he can overcome his sorrows and continue her life normally. Buying fresh and creamy milk is a sign that she will marry a wealthy person who is also a morally loyal person with whom she lives happily, away from all the troubles of the past. If he sees him on his boat and does not approach him, but begins to contemplate him deafly, he lives in a state of waiting and readiness to hear the good news that will be an important and decisive sign in his life. But if you put a little tea or coffee in Milk before you drink it, it curdles a little and goes quickly without a second thought. Seeing her cows or goats being milked is a good sign of her upcoming marriage and the overwhelming joy she feels. What is the interpretation of the milk of single women according to Ibn Sirin? When searching for the interpretation of the dream in Ibn Sirin's book, we need to know whether it is milk from a human breast or animal milk and of course the type of animal: Seeing a girl eating yellow cow's milk is a good sign that she will marry a man of good character and trust, which makes her live in the luxury that every woman desires. If she sees the cow giving birth to milk and she is in good health, there are fun events that will happen to her and make her heart happy with the person she wants to marry. If the milk falls from the breast of a person she knows well and collects it in a bowl, this indicates that he stands by that person in a problem he faces and has an important role in solving it. As for spoiled milk, it expresses the corruption of morals and the bad deeds that the girl does without remorse. You will find all the interpretations of Ibn Sirin's dreams and visions on the Egyptian dream interpretation site from Google. Interpretation of a dream of drinking milk for a single woman A girl eating fresh cow's milk is good evidence of Her good morals and beautiful qualities make her a strong candidate for marriage to a young man with the same morals. However, if she invites others to have milk with her and is a friend to her heart, she gives her trust to a person who may not deserve it, and she is often hurt by that friend who betrays her trust. If the taste is bitter, that is, frozen, then she will have to make an effort in her studies these days to get high grades in the test and achieve impressive results and she will do (God willing)

title: The 10 most important interpretations of seeing my ex-wife in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a divorced woman? Her desire to return to him and try to communicate with him. What is the purpose of seeing a divorced woman? Her life will change for the better soon. Do you see a divorced woman angry and does not want to talk to her? A sign that a major crisis has passed during this period. What does it mean to see her ex-husband naked? Evidence of her desire to return to her ex-husband. Seeing the divorced woman's look and smile towards him? Evidence that her condition has changed for the better. What is the purpose of seeing a divorced man caressing her while he is sad? Shows remorse. What is the interpretation of a divorced woman naked? I thought a lot about getting married again. Interpretation of seeing my ex-wife in a dream If a divorced woman sees a divorced man in a dream, this is evidence of her desire to return to him and her attempt to communicate with him. However, if the divorce was against her will, and she saw the divorced man chasing her while he was angry, this indicates that the divorced woman was trying to take revenge on her. When she sees her ex-husband trying to approach his family in a dream, this is evidence of feeling remorse and trying to return to his guardianship. While a woman's vision of the divorced family in a dream symbolizes that her life will change for the better in the near future, God willing. Seeing a divorced woman who lives with the divorced woman in the same house is an indication that she is thinking A lot in that and that God knows the unseen. Interpretation of seeing my ex-wife's family in a dream When a divorced woman sees the divorced woman's family in her house in a dream, this is evidence that the divorced woman will return to her soon. However, if she sees her ex-husband's family in her house and she is happy, it is a sign of many problems and disputes. While seeing divorced women in a divorced woman's dream symbolizes the problems between her and the divorced. If a woman sees the divorced woman's family and feels happy in her dream, this is a sign that the problems will end and she will return to the divorced woman. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing divorced women in a divorced woman's dream is evidence of the coming of goodness and abundance, God willing. Interpretation of dreams about my ex-husband who does not talk to me in a dream Seeing a divorced woman who does not talk to her in a dream indicates the many problems that existed between them during the marriage. But if he sees the divorced woman angry and does not want to talk to her in a dream, this is a sign that he is going through a major crisis at this time. When you see her ex-husband does not want to talk to her in a dream, it is a sign of her return to him and reconciliation between them, God willing. While the vision of the divorced woman refrains from talking about the divorced woman, it symbolizes her loss of the worries and sorrows she is going through. This vision can also indicate in The dream about thinking a lot about the divorced woman and the desire to return to her, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife naked in a dream If you see a divorced woman naked in a dream, this indicates that she is thinking of getting married again. When you see her ex-husband naked in a dream, this is evidence of her desire to return to her ex-husband, and God knows the unseen. But if she sees in her dream that her ex-husband is naked without clothes, this is evidence of her sadness over his separation and her desire to return to him. If she sees that her ex-husband is not wearing clothes in a dream, this

title: Interpretation of seeing a corpse in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Is it good or bad?

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing the dead transported in a dream by Ibn Sirin is good or bad. It is an unpleasant vision and its owner must understand the repercussions of this dream to avoid dangers that could destroy his life forever. Death in a dream means that the dreamer is at stake and his position in life is not enviable at all. Dead people indicate sadness, betrayal, disappointment and negative feelings, which are not happy dreams at all and it is worth asking for forgiveness a dreamer with such dreams often upon waking up from sleep Death and the dead in a dream. If any person, male or female, married or single, is seen carrying a corpse in an unnatural and incorrect way, it indicates forbidden money and that the fortuneteller carries heavy burdens because he lives on forbidden money. Whoever obtained it by an illegal act or stole it or He did not give him his full rights. Also included in the interpretation of this dream is that the dreamer spends his money on things that do not please God. It is not permissible for him to pay his sacrifice, and he prefers to spend his money on forbidden things, or on immoral acts. Or to spend his money on someone who does not need this. Money spent on the poor. Therefore, the fortuneteller's family should think about his financial affairs, where they come from, where it is spent and by whom it is spent. Does the seer perform the duties of zakat, zakat and helping others? As for the interpretation of seeing dead people in a dream in a natural way? This indicates the religious and worldly responsibilities that fall on the dreamer and that he must bear. This means that he is behaving very badly, is not close to his Lord, and is considered corrupt. So this dream is a reminder of his final resting place. For man and that we will all be held accountable one day. Therefore we must live in a way that does not carry many sins and make us eternal in hell. Therefore, seeing a corpse in a dream is a reminder that you need to change your life, and that you feel remorse. Because you are doing evil and hurting others and not living like good people. You must be careful. Interpretation of a dream about transporting the dead to the living. Interpretation of seeing a corpse in a dream indicates illness, lack of success, and bad luck. What happens to a person in his life means that this dream means that the dreamer will experience a great loss in his life. This loss will make his life not what it was before. Before, this loss is the result of a wrong action. Something he did in the past and it will be revealed to everyone, which makes him lose a lot. He may have worked in a scam in one of them. Lying for a promotion at work or messing with the house is one of the worst things. So the punishment will be difficult, This vision may mean that God's cover has been removed because he has harmed many people. This does not please God, so he will be punished severely for this and will appear soon. If one sees himself carrying a dead person among a large group of people, it means that he is lost. He does not know what he will do tomorrow. How he moves towards tomorrow with steady steps, and this is what frightens him, worries him, and even makes him. He regrets some of the missed opportunities in the past and wishes that he could turn back time so that he does not miss them again. But this regret does not help, but we must realize that there is always regret and that Life does not end with a certain opportunity. In K
